attributes.action: To request a judicial review of the referendum held on 23 June EU referendum
attributes.background: The referendum held on 23 June was initiated by David Cameron in order to heal a rift within the Tory party. It left a decision regarding the welfare and rights of millions of Britons for years to come at the mercy of a volatile political situation/ demagogic campaign.

rejection.details:
Judicial review is a court process. The courts are responsible for it. You can read more about it here:

https://www.judiciary.gov.uk/you-and-the-judiciary/judicial-review/

If you want a judicial inquiry into the referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139567
